original_text: If a person has a disease on his skin, you must bring him to the priest.
korean_text: 사람에게 나병이 들었거든 그를 제사장에게로 데려갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: If a person has a disease on his skin
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 사람에게 피부에 질병이 있다면

sentences.original_text: you must bring him to the priest
